pages.text: $(#551012)The Grimoire of the Veil is a book used to learn and upgrade abilities and passive skills. Utilizing it will be crucial for successful runs. $(br)$(#30923B)$(l)IMPORTANT:$(br)Storing XP in the book keeps XP between runs. Skills are also kept between runs!$()$(#30923B)

$(#551012)There are 3 classes you can delve into and combine: $(#FFFF55)Defense, Offense, and Mobility.$()$(#551012)$(br2)Each have multiple subclasses where you can specialize further to fit your gameplay style.$(br2)Press $(#104455)SHIFT + [number]$(#551012) to use an ability and $(#104455)G$(#551012) and $(#104455)H$(#551012) to cycle through ability groups.$(#551012)$(br2)------------------------------------>

$(#FFFF55)Skills are kept between runs.$(br2)$(#551012)Unlocking skills cost:$(br)- XP (stored between runs)$(br)- Souls (resets every runs)$(br2)You can obtain Souls by breaking $(#FFFF55)Traces of Death$(#551012).$(br2)Soul prices increase as you spend and there is a cap of 9 Souls, so spend wisely.$(br2)You can reset a build once per run.
